name: Android Nuance
tagline: The app you need to help you look up details.
body:
Nuance - an android NFC app built at [TAPPED, Android NFC Hackathon](http://www.tappednfc.com/) on October 6-7, 2012. [Hackerleague](https://www.hackerleague.org/hackathons/tapped-nfc/hacks/nuance)


> TAPPED: The NFC Accelerator is a collection of three free events, with one goal: drive innovation of novel NFC mobile app prototypes built on solid business plans.

![1](https://raw.github.com/katychuang/android-nuance/master/prod01_color.png) ![2](https://raw.github.com/katychuang/android-nuance/master/prod02_match.png)
